summary.long: 3 John is a book of the New Testament.

verses.text:
The elder,
To my dear friend Gaius, whom I love in the truth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Dear friend, I pray that you may enjoy good health and that all may go well with you, even as your soul is getting along well.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: It gave me great joy when some believers came and testified about your faithfulness to the truth, telling how you continue to walk in it.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: I have no greater joy than to hear that my children are walking in the truth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Dear friend, you are faithful in what you are doing for the brothers and sisters, even though they are strangers to you.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: They have told the church about your love. Please send them on their way in a manner that honors God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: It was for the sake of the Name that they went out, receiving no help from the pagans.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: We ought therefore to show hospitality to such people so that we may work together for the truth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: I wrote to the church, but Diotrephes, who loves to be first, will not welcome us.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So when I come, I will call attention to what he is doing, spreading malicious nonsense about us. Not satisfied with that, he even refuses to welcome other believers. He also stops those who want to do so and puts them out of the church.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Dear friend, do not imitate what is evil but what is good. Anyone who does what is good is from God. Anyone who does what is evil has not seen God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Demetrius is well spoken of by everyoneâ€”and even by the truth itself. We also speak well of him, and you know that our testimony is true.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: I have much to write you, but I do not want to do so with pen and ink.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: I hope to see you soon, and we will talk face to face.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Peace to you. The friends here send their greetings. Greet the friends there by name.
verses.speaker: Narrator
